channel.title: Bunny Hopping Returns?
channel.description: Given the changes valve made recently to CS:GO regarding bunny hopping ([youtube.com/watch?v=lNmRmWHXCCk](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lNmRmWHXCCk)), I wonder if it will be making a come back in Black Mesa.

item.title: Bunny Hopping Returns?
item.dc:creator: Agent6
item.description:
Crypt:

Doubt it, the team specifically and deliberately removed bunnyhopping and could have added it back in at any time if they wanted.

Not exactly.

I remember them saying that it was removed in the engine, and they were considering to add it back if it wasnâ€™t too much of a pain, in a way or another, but with no promises (I know for sure Chon said this somewhere in a thread after fury requested the feature over and over).

Read full topic
